summary: Recolored male version (Red / Brown) of the Archmage\'s Robes.
descriptionHtml:
I wanted to brighten up the male version of the Archmage\'s Robes, while still given the effect that they had been worn prior.  I also decided to go with a reddish earth tone, to give it a more natural feel.

This is my first \"mod\", so be gentle. ;)

Installation:
- Copy the \"textures\" folder to the Data folder.
STEAM: ...\\STEAM\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
author: Lothok
